contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 12, 2015 D Miners' Welfare Entertainment Contest
Miners' Welfare Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
miners-welfare-entertainment-contest
None
Newbridge Memorial Hall, Caerphilly, Wales, UK Most Entertaining Band: Cwmtawe Youth (£200) Highest Fourth Section Band not in the prizes: Ynyshir(£200) Highest Third Section Band not in the prizes: Cross Keys(£200) Best Soloist: Pauline Morgan (Soprano Cornet), Cross Keys Best Euphonium: Anthony Murrell - Cinderford Best Horns: Gwaun Cae Gurwen Best Cornet: Cwmtawe Youth Youngest Player: Dylan Savage - Ammanford Prizes - 1st £600, 2nd £400, 3rd £200. 9 bands competed.
Sept. 12, 2015, 9:29 a.m. July 8, 2020, 10:53 a.m.
1 Cinderford Band Chris Howley
2 Melingriffith 2 Band Robin Hackett
3 Cwmtawe District Youth Band Wayne Pedrick
4 Crwbin Silver Band Lynne Turner
5 Cross Keys Silver Band Benjamin James Atkinson
6 Ammanford Silver Band Glyn Rhys Davies
7 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Jeff Hutcherson
8 Ynyshir Band Gary Davies
9 Upper Rhondda Brass Band David Langley
Withdrawn Swindon Pegasus Brass David Mace
